Detailed Description

A geospatial grid of data in equilat equilon coordinates typically in WGS84 ellipsoid.

Author:
Valliappa.Lakshmanan

static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.add ( LatLonGrid  a,
LatLonGrid  b 
) [static] 

00213                                                              {
00214         int nrows = a.getNumLat();
00215         int ncols = a.getNumLon();
00216         if (b.getNumLat() != nrows || b.getNumLon() != ncols){
00217             throw new IllegalArgumentException("Grids are of different dimensions: first grid is " + nrows + "x" + ncols + " while second grid is " + b.getNumLat() + "x" + b.getNumLon());
00218         }
00219         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(a);
00220         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00221             if (result.data[i][j] != result.missing){
00222                 int bval = b.data[i][j];
00223                 if (bval != b.missing){
00224                     result.data[i][j] += bval;
00225                 } else {
00226                     result.data[i][j] = result.missing;
00227                 }
00228             }
00229         }
00230         return result;
00231     }

Pixel [] edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.asPixels (  )  

00237                              {
00238         List<Pixel> pixels = new ArrayList<Pixel>();
00239         for (int i=0; i < data.length; ++i) for (int j=0; j < data[i].length; ++j){
00240             if (data[i][j] != missing){
00241                 pixels.add(new Pixel(i,j,data[i][j]));
00242             }
00243         }
00244         return pixels.toArray(new Pixel[0]);
00245     }

Make a deep copy. 

00044                                                               {
00045         int[][] copy = new int[original.getNumLat()][original.getNumLon()];
00046         for (int i=0; i < original.getNumLat(); ++i){
00047             for (int j=0; j < original.getNumLon(); ++j){
00048                 copy[i][j] = original.data[i][j];
00049             }
00050         }
00051         return new LatLonGrid(copy, original.missing, original.nwCorner, original.latRes, original.lonRes);

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.crop ( int  startRow,
int  startCol,
int  numLat,
int  numLon 
)

Crop this grid.

Does not check dimensions 

00057                                                                               {
00058         int[][] copy = new int[numLat][numLon];
00059         for (int i=0; i < numLat; ++i){
00060             for (int j=0; j < numLon; ++j){
00061                 copy[i][j] = data[i+startRow][j+startCol];
00062             }
00063         }
00064         LatLon origin = this.getLocation(startRow, startCol);
00065         LatLon nwCorner = new LatLon( origin.getLat() + latRes/2 , origin.getLon() - lonRes/2 );
00066         return new LatLonGrid(copy, missing, nwCorner, latRes, lonRes);
00067     }

00195             for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){

LatLon edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.getLocation ( double  row,
double  col 
) 

00118                                                      {
00119         // latitude decreases, longitude increases
00120         return new LatLon( nwCorner.getLat() - (row+0.5)*latRes,
00121                 nwCorner.getLon() + (col+0.5)*lonRes );
00122     }

int [][] edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.longitudewrap ( int  Ny  )  

00247                                         {
00248            int nrows = data.length;
00249            int ncols = data[0].length;
00250            int hy = Ny/2;
00251            int outcols = ncols + 2*hy;
00252            int[][] result = new int[nrows][outcols];
00253            for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < outcols; ++j){
00254              int incol = j - hy;
00255              if (incol < 0) incol += ncols; // wrap
00256              else if (incol >= ncols) incol -= ncols; 
00257              result[i][j] = data[i][incol];
00258            }
00259            return result;
00260     }

LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.remapTo ( LatLonGrid  other  )  

00262                                                 {
00263         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(other);
00264         result.setMissing(this.getMissing());
00265         for (int i=0; i < other.getNumLat(); ++i){
00266             int row = getRow( other.getLocation(i,0) );
00267             for (int j=0; j < other.getNumLon(); ++j){
00268                 int col = getCol( other.getLocation(i,j) );
00269                 if (this.isValid(row,col)){
00270                     result.setValue(i,j, data[row][col]);
00271                 } else {
00272                     result.setValue(i,j, result.missing);
00273                 }
00274             }
00275         }
00276         return result;
00277     }

void edu.ou.asgbook.core.LatLonGrid.replace ( int  oldval,
int  newval 
) 

00201                                                {
00202         final int nrows = data.length;
00203         final int ncols = data[0].length;
00204         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i){
00205             for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00206                 if (data[i][j] == oldval){
00207                     data[i][j] = newval;
00208                 }
00209             }
00210         }
00211     }
